update.foreach: update assets_tech_transform_device set id =#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id =#{item.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name =#{item.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_entity mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.project_id , t1.device_name , t1.is_entity , t1.technical_requirement , t1.nation , t1.single_or_set , t1.unit_price , t1.amount , t1.total , t1.foreign_exchange , t1.bidding_situation , t1.remarks , t1.parent_id , t1.point_no , t1.tree_path , t1.point_level , t1.is_leaf , t1.device_sn , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_tech_transform_device t1 where t1.parent_id = #{pId} order by t1.device_sn desc

select t1.id , t1.project_id , t1.device_name , t1.is_entity , t1.technical_requirement , t1.nation , t1.single_or_set , t1.unit_price , t1.amount , t1.total , t1.foreign_exchange , t1.bidding_situation , t1.remarks , t1.parent_id , t1.point_no , t1.tree_path , t1.point_level , t1.is_leaf , t1.device_sn , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_tech_transform_device t1 where t1.project_id = #{projectId} AND t1.TREE_PATH like concat(#{treePath}, '%') order by t1.device_sn desc
mapper.delete: delete from assets_tech_transform_device t1 where t1.project_id = #{projectId}
